name: Urijah Xanders: Death Maze
description:
4 Cubes are token from the planet of Cubenia after the king of Cubenia lost a bet to a very popular known Star-lord named Urijah Xander. Urijah is know for setting traps such as mazes and other mechanisms. The anonymously known "Death Maze" is to trap 4 cubes, and can only be one winner or if they are unlucky then none. So good luck, you'll need it. ;)

Moving: WASD

Attack: Left Mouse Click

Equip: E
